Project3

Class CandyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project3.CandyGame

  • public class CandyGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the methods required to perform the necessary actions to play the game.
    Author:
    Ngoc Tran, Demetria Johansen CSCI235

    • Constructor Detail

      • CandyGame

        public CandyGame(int lowerLimit,
                 int upperLimit)
        The constructor of the class. The number of students is asked and an array representing students is created in the constructor.
        Parameters:
        lowerLimit - The lower limit
        upperLimit - The upper limit

    • Method Detail

      • getNumbOfStudents

        public int getNumbOfStudents(int lowerLimit,
                             int upperLimit)
        This method helps to get an integer from the user in the range from a lower limit to an upper limit inclusive. If the user enters an invalid input, show a notification and ask for another input.
        Parameters:
        lowerLimit - The lower limit
        upperLimit - The upper limit
        Returns:
        an integer which is the number of students playing the game

      • getEvenInt

        public int getEvenInt(int evenLowerLimit,
                      int evenUpperLimit)
        This method gets and returns an even integer in the range from an even (i.e. not odd) lower limit to an even upper limit inclusive. If the user enters an invalid input, show a notification and ask for another input.
        Parameters:
        evenLowerLimit - The even lower limit
        evenUpperLimit - The even upper limit
        Returns:
        an even integer in the range from an even (i.e. not odd) lower limit to an even upper limit inclusive

      • distributeCandy

        public void distributeCandy(int evenLowerLimit,
                            int evenUpperLimit)
        This method will distribute a number of pieces of candy to an array of integers (representing the students). The number given to each student must be random, even, and between two specified even limits inclusive.
        Parameters:
        evenLowerLimit - The even lower limit
        evenUpperLimit - The even upper limit

      • printIntegers

        public void printIntegers()
        Prints out the simple and long versions of the game.

      • passCandy

        public void passCandy()
        Passes the candy to students (1/2 of each student's is passed to the other). If there is an odd number then 1 is added

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Tests if the game is over.
        Returns:
        isOver (whether the game is over or not)
